thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au
thread.title: Katie

author: Katie
title: Katie
text:
Easy to use. A bit disconcerting for a first time user that you don't get your funds until after the event but funds arrived within days of the event.
The extra Ticketmaster fees seem exorbitant and meant I felt that I had to list my tickets below cost to have any chance of selling them - that fee should probably be reduced.
Successful sale though. Easy to use.
